name: 林嘉彤
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選中高級程度，涵括多種領域的英語教材來加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解生字、片語、句法的解釋；(3)透過練習加強讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1  Brief Introduction;Tulipmania
Week 2  Crack Shot; Acrobatic Worms
Week 3  But It Tastes Good
Week 4  Count Dracula: Fact or Fiction?; The Kingly Monarch Butterfly
Week 5  Gruesome Plants
Week 6  Early Doctoring Practices
Week 7  The Terra Cotta Army
Week 8  An Ancient Disaster
Week 9  Mid-term Exam
Week 10 An Artistic Mystery
Week 11 Thundersorms; Bird or Mammal?
Week 12 Are You a Good Detective?
Week 13 A Natural Contract
Week 14 How Hollywood Went ”Hollywood”
Week 15 Eyeglasses
Week 16 A Greek to Remember
Week 17 The Story of the Hamburger
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. (要求預習每篇選文)上課時請同學上台講析，並就其精確度給予平時分數
2. 期中考試
3. 期末考試
4. 出缺席狀況及課堂參與程度
materials:
Six-Way Paragraphs: Advanced Level
Active: Skills for Reading  Book 3
Read and Think  Book 4
